Ruby.en: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.

Sapphire.en: Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this Pokémon gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.

Emerald.en: A Wynaut loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.

FireRed.en: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

LeafGreen.en: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

Diamond.en: It grows stronger by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

Pearl.en: It grows stronger by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

Platinum.en: It grows stronger by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

HeartGold.en: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
